task.title: KV30F Signal Multiplexing and Pin Assignments
task.shortdesc: The signal multiplexing and pin assignments are also provided in an Excel file attached to this document:

step.cmd: Click the paperclip symbol on the left side of the PDF window.
Double-click on the Excel file to open it.

result.p: The Port Control Module is responsible for selecting which ALT functionality is available on each pin.
